data.title: Pixar's 'Turning Red' to skip theaters, head straight to Disney+ in March
data.description: "Turning Red" is the third Pixar film to transition to Disney's streaming platform during the pandemic.

data.title: Goldman-backed digital bank Starling boycotts Meta over scam ads
data.description: Starling CEO Anne Boden said her firm would no longer pay for advertising on Facebook and Instagram while scammers target customers.

data.title: DHS warns online threats have increased on extremist platforms over past 48 hours with some against lawmakers
data.description: There has been an increase in online extremist content in the past 48 hours, including threats to lawmakers and the President, according to a Department of Homeland Security intelligence memo obtained by CNN.

data.title: On the anniversary of January 6, social media platforms are on high alert
data.description: January 6 was a clear turning point for major social media companies — proving that they would, under certain circumstances, be willing to deplatform a sitting US president. But some experts worry that they still haven't done enough to address the underlying issues that allowed Trump supporters and others on the far-right to be misled and radicalized, and to get organized using their platforms.

data.title: NASA's first Artemis moon mission will have a virtual astronaut: Amazon's Alexa
data.description: NASA's Artemis 1 mission, slated for take off as soon as this March, aims to send an Orion spacecraft around the moon. The cabin will be largely empty, save for an a interactive tablet that has been dubbed "Callisto," which will sit propped up to face an astronaut mannequin. Callisto is essentially a touch-screen device that features reconfigured versions of Alexa, Amazon's voice assistant, and Cisco's teleconferencing platform WebEx.

data.title: Dubai's virtual waiter startup sees a surge in demand during the Covid-19 pandemic
data.description: The Opaala platform, which allows customers to order and pay in restaurants through their smart phones, can also track the preferences of individual diners and create bespoke menus for them.

data.title: Macy's shortens store hours as COVID-19 cases surge
data.description: Macy's Inc will reduce its US store hours for the rest of January as it prepares for potential COVID-19 cases among workers with the Omicron variant driving up infections across the United States.

data.title: Founder of crypto lending platform argues that bitcoin could hit $100,000 by mid-2022
data.description: Bitcoin could see further upside and surge as high as $100,000 by the middle of 2022, according to Antoni Trenchev of cryptocurrency lender Nexo.

data.title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene says Facebook blocked her account for 24 hours
data.description: Facebook has blocked Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene from posting on its platform for 24 hours, the Georgia Republican said Monday.

data.title: Wired's top editor: Metaverse 'feels like a terminological land grab'
data.description: The word "metaverse" is popping up everywhere. Facebook recently changed its name to Meta Platforms. Nike bought a virtual shoe company to help it expand to the metaverse. And other brands like Gucci and Ralph Lauren have been considering the future of fashion with digital personas.
